props.name: itemHeight
props.description: Height of each item in the WheelPicker

props.name: activeTextColor
props.description: Text color for the focused row

props.name: inactiveTextColor
props.description: Text color for other, non-focused rows

props.name: label
props.description: Additional label to render next to the items text

props.name: style
props.note: height is computed according to itemHeight * numberOfVisibleRows

props.name: align
props.description: Align the content to center, right ot left

props.name: testID
props.description: Align the content to center, right ot left
